items.name: Cave Lion Saddle
items.description: Equip a Cave Lion with this to ride it.

items.name: Chicken Egg
items.description: Tremendously nourishing by itself, this egg provides basic nutritional value in many cooking recipes.

items.name: Fertilized Chicken Egg
items.description: Tremendously nourishing by itself, this egg provides basic nutritional value in many cooking recipes.

items.name: Roasted Beef
items.description:
Sates your hunger, and provides health while being digested.  More effective than prime meat. 
Wild carnivores LOVE this meat! This meat is great to use in custom recipes.

items.name: Raw Beef
items.description:
Eating raw food will sate hunger, but is unhealthy for humans.  This excellent cut spoils very quickly.
Most wild carnivores love this meat. This meat is also great to use in custom recipes.

items.name: Roasted Beef Blueprint - Campfire
items.description: Add this Blueprint to a Campfire to be able to cook delicious Roast Beef.

items.name: Roasted Beef Blueprint - Industrial Grill
items.description: Add this Blueprint to an Industrial Grill to be able to cook delicious Roast Beef.

items.name: Roasted Beef Blueprints
items.description: For crafting Blueprints to allow Roast Beef to be cooked in Campfires and Industrial Grills

items.name: Cattle Milk (AoA)
items.description: Highly nutritious and perfect for keeping young creatures happy and satiated

items.name: Spoiled Cattle Milk (AoA)
items.description: Ewwwww, this is disgusting and stinky!

items.name: Aurochs Saddle
items.description: Equip an Aurochs with this to ride it.

items.name: Aurochs Cart Saddle
items.description: Equip an Aurochs with this to ride it and to move produce.

items.name: Whale Louse
items.description: Disgusting and oversized creepy crawling aquatic parasite, luckily only found on one kind of whale. Used to cure infestations, and the only thing Hammerheads will eat.

items.name: Whale Louse Antidote
items.description: Used to curb outbreaks of Whale Louse infestations. For Taming a Whale, put in slot 0, gather lice, and then use when prompted, and repeat until tamed. To keep tamed Whales louse free, put in slot 0 and select the option from the Whales radial menu, or use it in the Whales inventory. Keep an eye on the meter when riding your Whale. If over infested your Whale will turn aggressive, will not not respond to orders, and will be made to wander until the infestation is cleared, make sure you regularly treat your Whales.

items.name: Polymer
items.description: These incredibly strong, lightweight plates can be shaped and then heat treated into casings for anything.

items.name: Cooked Pork Chop
items.description: Sates your hunger, and provides health while being digested.  Wild carnivores will eat it, but prefer raw meat.

items.name: All Day Breakfast
items.description: Full English with all the trimmings, guaranteed to keep you going all day

items.name: Pork Chop
items.description: Extra nutritious meat. Carnivores can wolf this down quickly, and will feel the benefits.

items.name: Full English Breakfast
items.description: Add this Blueprint to a Cooking Pot to be able to cook a delicious Full English Breakfast

items.name: Cooked Pork Chops Blueprint - Campfire
items.description: Add this Blueprint to a Campfire to be able to cook delicious Cooked Pork Chops

items.name: Cooked Pork Chops Blueprint - Industrial Grill
items.description: Add this Blueprint to an Industrial Grill to be able to cook delicious Cooked Pork Chops.

items.name: Cooked Pork Blueprints
items.description: For crafting Blueprints to allow Pork to be cooked in Campfires and Industrial Grills and for making Full English Breakfasts

items.name: Metridiochoerus Saddle

items.name: Sivatherium Saddle
items.description: Equip a Sivatherium with this to ride it.

items.name: Raw Mollusc Meat
items.description: Eating raw food will SLIGHTLY sate hunger, but is unhealthy for humans.  This excellent cut spoils very quickly. Most wild carnivores love this meat. Wild Pescavores absolutely adore it.

items.name: Fertilized Lycoteuthis Egg
items.description: Eat it to gain tremendous nourishment

items.name: Lycoteuthis Saddle
items.description: Equip a Lycoteuthis with this to ride it.
